alert.note: Alert for Lucas; Ottawa; Sandusky; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 1:13AM EDT until July 29 at 2:30AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ottawa County in northwestern Ohio... Northwestern Sandusky County in northwestern Ohio... Northeastern Wood County in northwestern Ohio... Lucas County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 230 AM EDT. * At 113 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles east of Morenci to near Liberty Center, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Toledo, Swanton, Perrysburg, Oregon, Sylvania, Rossford, Waterville, Northwood, Whitehouse, Genoa, Woodville, Holland, Elmore, Maumee, Ottawa Hills, Walbridge, Millbury, Haskins, Luckey and Rocky Ridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
